name: Ratio Humana
description:
Ratio Humana is an action/adventure pixel game for PC. It is surrounded by a dark story based in Gnostic creation beliefs. The game play is split between space and ground levels. The overall path is semi linear where the game will follow a main story arch and have multiple side quests. Fly around the galaxy finding both old artifacts and new technology to fight Yaldabaoth and his Ateratra. Upgrade your spaceship or buy new ones, upgrade items you find along the way, and keep a lookout for permanent health and attack upgrades in secret areas.

   Aza
A nomad wandering the galaxy with her pilot in search of anything they can sell to keep fuel in the tank.

                                                                                                       

                                                                                          Yaldabaoth and The Ateratra 

Since the splitting of Pleroma, the Aeons have been at odds. Some wish to return existence back  to singularity  and rejoin the Spheres of Pleroma. The others wish to keep them separate and tend to their own kingdoms. One among them, Yaldabaoth, seeks a new salvation, a perfect end. Cascading through galaxies like a tidal wave ending their existence, or worse, changing every sentient being within them into soulless metal drones.

                  "Flesh Made Metal Is Salvation's End."        "Those With Wings Were First"    -Apocryphon of Yaldabaoth                                     - Sylloge Of The Ateratra
 "The Ateratra have breached the horizon, all is lost to the coming darkness."
-Unknown Soldier
